com.yantra.ycp.ui.io

Class YCPWeighingFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.ycp.ui.io.YCPWeighingFactory

  • public class YCPWeighingFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory class which allows Yantra application to get handle to actual weighing scale connector implementation. Once this class is initialized, getConnector can be called to obtain the instance of default weighing scale implementaion class.
    Notice that this factory is used by the execution UI applets (e.g., packing station) and hence the initialization is done at the station level. This factory currently assumes only one weighing scale is attached to one station.
    This class follows the Singleton pattern.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static YCPWeighingFactory getInstance()
        Get the singleton instance of the factory.
        Returns:
        Factory instance

      • init

        public void init(com.yantra.yfc.dom.YFCElement deviceParams)
        Initializes this factory given the station configuration. It walks through the DOM and extracts the weighing scale config (assuming only one weighing scale per station) and initializes the YCPWeighingScaleConnector implementation.
        Parameters:
        deviceParams - Configuration DOM element for the station. Current format is given below. 
            <DeviceParamsXML>
        <Attributes>
            <Attribute Name="ClassName" Value="" />
            <Attribute Name="PortId" Value="" />
            <Attribute Name="BaudRate" Value="" />
            <Attribute Name="DataBits" Value="" />
            <Attribute Name="StopBits" Value="" />
            <Attribute Name="Parity" Value="" />
            <Attribute Name="FlowIn" Value="" />
            <Attribute Name="FlowOut" Value="" />
            <!-- other extended attributes specific to weighing scale connector implementations -->
            <Attribute Name="" Value="" />
        </Attributes>
    </DeviceParamsXML>

      • getConnector

        public YCPWeighingScaleConnector getConnector()
        Gets the default station level weighing scale connector implementaion object.
        Returns:
        Weighing scale connector instance. Throws an exception if an instance was not initialized during init call.
